Alot of yall seem to hate Takayuki, but none of this is his fault. Hori kept his mouth shut at the start and Takayuki actually likes Chitose. Besides he just seems like a bro throughout this entire thing and doesn't have some any bad intentions.

Nah this ain't NTR, it's just a love story of a dude who missed his chance. Takayuki ain't even a bad guy nor is he doing this out of spite or bad intent, guy seems to legitimately care about Chitose and seems to be bestbuds with Hori. Hori is still getting some from Mika and seems to be ok besides being a little heartbroken, but it seems he might have another shot at hentai love with this new chick.

NTR definitely doesn't apply here. They weren't even dating in the first place. Also the blonde dude wasn't really a bad person. He expressed his interest in Chitose and asked the MC what he thinks but he never even told him how he feels. It's their fault for being idiots and not confessing to each other in the first place.

It's not exactly NTR when they're not even dating in the first place. Sure, they had feelings for each other, but they never confessed their feelings, and, well, lost the chance to. Things might have been different if at least one of them had the courage to confess, before things got out of hand. If there's one thing that we've learned in this, it's that to take a leap of faith, before it's too late.
